column4: Evolution and GoDaddy stmp out are not working for me, but I got it working with Thunderbird.
Does anyone know if I can install more tan one distro through Wubi?  For example, if I want Ubuntu and Mint and OpenSUSE on one machine, can Wubi do it? *linux noob*
Should work, yes.  You may have to manually edit your boot.ini, but the OS installs would be independant and all that
